short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the taxi fare to Ben Gurion Airport (TLV) from any location in Israel or from the airport to your destination.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily calculate the taxi fare to Ben Gurion Airport (TLV) from any location in Israel or from the airport to your destination. With this simple extension, you can estimate your travel cost in advance and conveniently book a taxi to or from the airport. No hassle, just a few clicks to ensure a smooth ride to or from Ben Gurion Airport.
